name: Closure
content:
exe: Closure.bin.x86
exe64: Closure.bin.x86_64
files:
- file1: N/A:Please select the Humble installer
installer:
- chmodx: $file1
- execute:
    args: --tar -xf -C $CACHE
    file: $file1
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $CACHE/instarchive_linux_x86
    format: lzma
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $CACHE/instarchive_linux_x86_64
    format: lzma
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $CACHE/instarchive_all
    format: lzma
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    file: $CACHE/instarchive_linux_x86~
    format: tar
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    file: $CACHE/instarchive_linux_x86_64~
    format: tar
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    file: $CACHE/instarchive_all~
    format: tar
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $CACHE/subarch
    format: lzma
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/sa
    file: $CACHE/subarch~
    format: tar
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $CACHE/sa/deps/alut/alut_files_linux_x86_64
    format: lzma
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    file: $CACHE/alut_files_linux_x86_64~
    format: tar
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $CACHE/sa/deps/Cg/Cg_files_linux_x86_64
    format: lzma
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/lib64
    file: $CACHE/Cg_files_linux_x86_64~
    format: tar
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $CACHE/sa/deps/openal/openal_files_linux_x86_64
    format: lzma
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/lib64
    file: $CACHE/openal_files_linux_x86_64~
    format: tar
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $CACHE/sa/deps/SDL-1.2/SDL-1.2_files_linux_x86_64
    format: lzma
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/lib64
    file: $CACHE/SDL-1
    format: tar
- move:
    dst: $CACHE/SDL-1_x64
    src: $CACHE/SDL-1
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $CACHE/sa/deps/alut/alut_files_linux_x86
    format: lzma
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/lib
    file: $CACHE/alut_files_linux_x86~
    format: tar
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $CACHE/sa/deps/Cg/Cg_files_linux_x86
    format: lzma
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/lib
    file: $CACHE/Cg_files_linux_x86~
    format: tar
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $CACHE/sa/deps/openal/openal_files_linux_x86
    format: lzma
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/lib
    file: $CACHE/openal_files_linux_x86~
    format: tar
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $CACHE/sa/deps/SDL-1.2/SDL-1.2_files_linux_x86
    format: lzma
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/lib
    file: $CACHE/SDL-1
    format: tar
